Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2018 11:25AM MKBRENNEN wrote: I found a lump in my right breast last year and was sent or an ultra sound of it they Dr. stated it was a fat Lobule, and that is was benign, but they would watch it and make sure to get my annual mammograms, I also have dense breast tissue. I have noticed this lobule has gotten bigger and now hurts. I'm worried about it! Can I ask for a biopsy? I want to be certain.
Posts.Title: Palpable Breast Masses djmammo lkpage
